document_data.name: ''Red Potion''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''violet potion''''' was a peculiar yet powerful that offered for sale by a traveling carnival-merchant during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Close examination of this potion revealed quite the odd solution.
document_data.Powers:
Whomever drank this potion underwent a variety of physical changes, both beneficial and harmful in effect. They were inflicted greatly reduced physical resilience and were seemingly sapped of their agility and deftness of movement. However they were granted heroic strength, roughly equivalent to that of the mighty [[titan]]s.

Both of the potion's effects lasted for a full 24 hours.
document_data.History: A single ''violet potion'' was offered for sale by a merchant at the [[Nashkel carnival]] in the {{YearlinkName|1368}}.
